name: Special Hero
description:
Get your metal weapons filled with slug & get ready for the ultimate soldier action & be a Metal soldier.

Use various weapons filled with slug and power ups to fight your way through a multiple enemies, metal tanks, copters and put an end to the evil army leader’s and his world of terror !!

Very awesome challenging action game with amazing graphics and smooth gameplay will make you play this game for hours. This action game will take you through series of classic levels, various enemies and boss battles with amazing experiance of side scrolling platformer games.

*Tap the Left and Right arrow to switch direction

*Tap on the Jump button to make your hero jump

*Tap continuously to make your hero jump higher and run farther

*Collect coins while running

*Try to kill the enemies before run into them using automatic weapon

*Avoid the death trap
